2057250.name: Fantasy Grounds - Troll Trouble 1
2057250.description:
Troll Trouble 1

A pack filled with Rock, Ice,River/Sea,Moss and Normal Trolls for your games, these were designed to look a bit more humanoid and cunning than your average troll.

This product includes:
  • BulkTroll_Greatclub
  • BulkTroll_Hatchet
  • BulkTroll_HideArmor
  • BulkTroll_Naked01
  • BulkTroll_Naked02
  • BulkTroll_Naked03
  • BulkTroll_ReptileArmor01
  • BulkTroll_ReptileArmor02
  • BulkTroll_ReptileArmor03
  • BulkTroll_ReptileWarrior_Battleaxe
  • BulkTroll_ReptileWarrior_Longbow
  • BulkTroll_Spear
  • IceTroll_Bulk_Claw
  • IceTroll_Bulk_IceHatchets
  • IceTroll_Bulk_IcePickaxe
  • IceTroll_Bulk_IceSpear
  • IceTroll_Slim_DualHatchets
  • IceTroll_Slim_FurArmor
  • IceTroll_Slim_Greataxe
  • IceTroll_Slim_Greatbow
  • IceTroll_Slim_Naked01
  • IceTroll_Slim_Naked02
  • IceTroll_Slim_Naked03
  • MossTroll_Slim_BoneClub
  • MossTroll_Slim_Handaxes
  • MossTroll_Slim_Naked01
  • MossTroll_Slim_Naked02
  • MossTroll_Slim_Naked03
  • MossTroll_Slim_Spear
  • RockTroll_Slim_Greatclub
  • RockTroll_Slim_Naked01
  • RockTroll_Slim_Naked02
  • RockTroll_Slim_Naked03
  • RockTroll_Slim_Pick
  • RockTroll_Slim_Spear
  • Troll_Slim_Greataxe
  • Troll_Slim_Greatbow
  • Troll_Slim_Greatclub
  • Troll_Slim_HideArmor
  • Troll_Slim_IronArmor
  • Troll_Slim_Javelin
  • Troll_Slim_Naked
  • Troll_Slim_Naked02
  • Troll_Slim_Naked03
  • WaterTroll_Slim_Crossbow
  • WaterTroll_Slim_Harpoon
  • WaterTroll_Slim_Naked01
  • WaterTroll_Slim_Naked02
  • WaterTroll_Slim_Naked03
  • WaterTroll_Slim_Trident
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
